channel.title: I just need some help
channel.description: Hey guys, can someone explain the teleport commands to me? i understand the first 2 are the x and y coords, can you tell me what the proceeding numbers are for?

item.title: I just need some help
item.dc:creator: @nickenator nickenator
item.description:
@nickenator wrote:

[quote=“rain1994, post:4, topic:350314”][quote author=nickenator link=topic=446681.msg3278195#msg3278195 date=1279697809]
hmm, i understand the 317 commands, they couldnt get easier, its the 508 commands im having trouble with… heres an example…

[code]if (cmd[0].equals(“gwd”)) {

			if (p.attackedBy != null) {
				p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command while in combat.");
				return;
			}
			p.teleportTo(2871, 5318, 2, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
                             
		}[/code]

that teleports you to godwars, but its a wilderness area, so theres no way to teleport out, can you or anybody else help me?
[/quote]
You can change the area of GWD or you can make that area in non wild (sorry I can’t remeber what file)[/quote]

is it in player.java?

Read full topic

that teleports you to godwars, but its a wilderness area, so theres no way to teleport out, can you or anybody else help me?[/quote]
You can change the area of GWD or you can make that area in non wild (sorry I can’t remeber what file)

item.title: I just need some help
item.dc:creator: @rain1994 rain1994
item.description:
@rain1994 wrote:

Here is the ::home command

if(command.startsWith("home")){ triggerTele(3088, 3495, 0); brightness = 4; }

Read full topic
